claims.claim: Network Alpha Factory reduces operational costs for all customers
claims.quote: Overall, Network Alpha Factory, which earned Verizon a 2023 US CIO 100 Award for IT innovation and leadership, promises to bring operational costs down for all customers, Singh says.

claims.claim: The platform reduces timeline fourfold compared to manual processes
claims.quote: an end-to-end dashboard that provides a view of all circuits, network data, inventory, devices to be decommissioned, and the expected timeline, which the platform helps reduce fourfold when compared to performing tasks manually, according to Verizon.

claims.claim: Network Alpha Factory enables reduced network ownership costs for Verizon
claims.quote: According to Verizon, the platform enables network operations and sales organizations to migrate traffic from legacy networks to the new iEN in a coordinated, less disruptive manner, giving customers access to higher speeds and lower latency while enabling Verizon to reduce network ownership costs.

claims.claim: The platform reduces the need for physical trips to customer sites
claims.quote: It includes bots for performing network element testing and reduces the need for physical trips to customers sites.

claims.claim: Verizon achieved 874 Metro Area RootScore Awards, 70% more than closest competitor
claims.quote: In addition to the eighth consecutive national 5G reliability award, Verizon achieved 874 Metro Area RootScore Awards, 70% more awards than the closest competitor.

claims.claim: More than 280 million people have access to Verizon's 5G Ultra Wideband network
claims.quote: Now more than 280 million people have access to Verizon's 5G Ultra Wideband network.

claims.claim: AI-powered predictive maintenance reduces downtime and prevents service disruptions
claims.quote: AI-powered predictive maintenance has greatly enhanced Verizon's network reliability. Verizon proactively detects and resolves issues, reducing downtime and preventing service disruptions.

claims.claim: Predictive maintenance results in substantial cost savings by reducing emergency repairs
claims.quote: Beyond enhancing service quality, predictive maintenance has also resulted in substantial cost savings. Emergency repairs, which often require urgent resource allocation, have been significantly reduced.
